titleStmt.title: Reflections upon learning wherein is shewn the insufficiency thereof, in its several particulars, in order to evince the usefulness and necessity of revelation / by a gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Baker, Thomas, 1656-1740.

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Baker. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
